definitions: The action of breaking suddenly and completely with a sharp cracking sound.
The action of making a sudden, eager bite.
The action of speaking or retorting sharply or irritably.
The action of taking a photograph.
The action of closing or fastening with a sharp sound.
examples: The twig was snapping under his foot.
The dog was snapping at the ball.
She was snapping at her colleagues.
He was snapping pictures of the scenery.
